rows.label: qev017701_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh, [ST:playername ]! Guess what happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0002
rows.name: I determined the location of the final data unitâ€”FN097![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0003
rows.name:
The signal came from Cauldros. It's a dangerous area,
but nothing you can't handle, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Kirsty you can handle it.

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0021
rows.name: Bug your eyes out and shake your head furiously.

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0004
rows.name:
All my fellow Pathfinders are tough as nails, but I've
never seen a BLADE operative as talented as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, come on! That shoots past humble and goes
straight into crazy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Besides, you've got the expanded FrontierNav at your
back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0007
rows.name:
I personally guarantee that you're capable of navigating
Cauldros like a total pro.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0008
rows.name:
Please, help me take New LA one step closer to the
ideal city my team knew it could be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oh, and while you're there, can you mine miranium
and also take care of some deadland caro that have
been rampaging through the area?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0010
rows.name: But really, data unit FN097 is the big prize.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0011
rows.name:
This is the final piece of my former team's legacy.
Can I count on you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Frankly, I have no idea what a second-generation
FrontierNav will look like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0013
rows.name:
The team worked on it in their spare time with
practically no budget, so I can't imagine it's ready
for implementation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0014
rows.name:
The amount of dedication they showed was quite
remarkable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0015
rows.name:
And whatever is on that archive is a result of their
fervent desire to create a better future for humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Er, so you're cool with all this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod with quiet resolve.

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0040
rows.name: Accuse

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that she's obsessing for personal reasons.

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0017
rows.name:
Thank you. This is all so personal, you know?
I was rather afraid to open up about it, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0018
rows.name:
But I'm glad I told you, [ST:playername ].
Now go do this thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0019
rows.name:
That's...a fair criticism. I appreciate your candor.
It's possible I'm getting overly sentimental about this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0020
rows.name:
But I also think it's important for all of us here in
New LA, so please, just try your best, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0021
rows.name:
We need as much miranium as we can get if we want
to keep living on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0022
rows.name:
Please, for humanity's sake and for the memory of my
departed colleagues...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0023
rows.name: see this assignment through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0024
rows.name: Hundreds of people rely on the miranium you bring us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0025
rows.name:
If you managed to conjure up another 5,500 units,
I'll be happy to take it off your hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0050
rows.name: Deliver[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0051
rows.name: Hand over 5,500 units of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0060
rows.name: Keep[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0061
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0026
rows.name:
You have to be the only one in all of New LA who
could track down this much miranium.
Thank you...for everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0027
rows.name:
Now there's just the other objectives in Cauldros
that need completing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0029
rows.name: All right. I'll trust your judgment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0030
rows.name:
Thank you for the miranium. Now all that's left are the
two other objectives in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0031
rows.name:
That data was their dream, [ST:playername ].
See that it gets home safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0032
rows.name:
Ha! So you've completed all of the objectives, eh?
And the final data unit seems to be intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0033
rows.name:
I say this not as the FrontierNav operations manager,
but as a member of my old research team...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0034
rows.name: Thank you. I am so, SO grateful for what you've done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0035
rows.name:
All boasting aside, FrontierNav really is a remarkable
system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0036
rows.name:
But without a user like you, it's meaningless.
It's just a network of data probes that produce a pool
of random data with no purpose.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0037
rows.name:
A BLADE of your caliber is the final piece required by
our design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0071
rows.name: Nod with pride.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0080
rows.name: Thank[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that the true heroes are her and her team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0038
rows.name:
If the team were still here, we'd have a party in your
honor. And believe me, there ain't no party like a
crazy scientist party![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0039
rows.name: They'd have been proud to hear you say that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0040
rows.name:
Here. This is for everything you've done.
Thank you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0041
rows.name: However...there's still one last problem I didn't consider.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0042
rows.name:
All of this recovered data is encrypted, and none of the
authors are left to crack it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0043
rows.name:
It won't be easy to figure out what's in these archives,
but I'll give it my best shot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0044
rows.name:
In the meantime, I'm sure you'll keep using FrontierNav
to help people in need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0091
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that she can count on it.

rows.label: qev017701_JNK0100
rows.name: Disagree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_SEL0101
rows.name:
Admit that you're only using
FrontierNav for your own gain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0045
rows.name:
Once I crack this data, I'll let you know right away.
But don't be a stranger, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0046
rows.name:
I'd love to hear the latest on how FrontierNav is
working in the field.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0047
rows.name: Ugh, you sound like Tobias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev017701_MSG0048
rows.name: I just pray you don't follow in his footsteps.[ST:wait ]
